description: Due to an unexpected turn of events, the young man Al got himself into Cornelica, the land of the Succubi. She met Lily, one of the succubi who lives there, and who in turn helped him to survive in the town from the threat of getting assaulted by other succubi. They already found out a way for Al to return to the human world. However...

titles.title: Danger-filled Cornelica: A Paradise for the Succubi
Kiken ga Ippai Cornelica: Succubus-tachi no Rakuen
危険がいっぱいコルネリカ~サキュバスたちの楽園~
